idea-plugin.name: SerialVersionUID Generator
idea-plugin.description:
Adds missing serialVersionUID fields to Serializable classes automatically. Ensures compliance with Java serialization best practices, avoiding runtime warnings and deserialization issues.

**Key Features:**
  • Detects missing serialVersionUID in classes implementing or inheriting Serializable.
  • Quick-fix to generate unique, valid serialVersionUID values.
  • Handles complex inheritance, including interfaces extending Serializable.
See the GitHub repository for source code and contributions.
